Effects.Full:
Winning Belief: Increases ATK by 10%. This effect can be stacked up to 3 times. 1 stack is consumed for each command used other than using Cold Precision Shot. This effect cannot be dispelled

Conventional Strategy: Decreases AoE damage received by 25%, 1 layer is consumed for each instance of AoE damage received. This effect can be stacked up to 3 layers, and is considered as a buff

Emergency Strategy: Decreases AoE damage received by 25% x the number of current layers, 1 layer is consumed for each instance of AoE damage received. This effect can be stacked up to 3 layers, and is considered as a buff

Lone Wolf: Before using an active attack, inflicts Solidification on the target. The number of layers inflicted is equivalent to the instances of damage dealt by the attack. This effect lasts for 1 turn, only takes effect once, is considered as a buff and cannot be dispelled

Solidification: Decreases Movement Speed by 1 tile; at the end of the action, if the holder has 2 layers of Solidification, it is converted into Chill, which lasts for 1 turn. Solidification can be stacked up to 2 layers. This is considered as a Ice type debuff

Chill: Cannot move or be displaced. This is considered as a Ice type debuff

Frost Barrier: Exhausts the Frost Barrier's HP to negate damage. If the Frost Barrier is broken, inflicts Chill on the unit that broke it for 1 turn. This is considered as a Ice type buff and cannot be dispelled

Overwatch: If Frost Barrier is active, when enemies uses an active attack against allies within attack range, activates Ambush and deals Ice damage equivalent to 90% ATK and 2 Stability damage, and inflicts Solidification for 1 turn. This effect can be triggered twice per turn and cannot be dispelled

Ambush: Attacks once. Cannot be triggered by Counter or Support attacks

Focused Attention: Increases damage dealt by 7.5%. This effect can be stacked up to 4 times, and cannot be dispelled

Insight: Increases effective range of Ultimate skill by 1 tile. This is considered as a buff

Steady Movement: Increases movement speed by 1 tile. The holder is immune to enemy's displacement effects. This effect cannot be dispelled

Extra Movement: Can move once, but is unable to execute any commands

Cold Blooded Instinct: Immune to Solidification and Chill. When Macchiato deals Ice damage towards the holder, deals 20% more damage. If Macchiato counters the weakness of the holder, deals 30% more damage instead. This effect cannot be dispelled

Basic.SkillName:
Lone Wolf Territory

(Basic Attack / Single Target)
Basic.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 9 tile radius and deals Physical damage equivalent to 80% ATK to it

Skill.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 9 tile radius and deals Ice damage equivalent to 160% ATK to it. Increases CRIT DMG of this attack by 30%. For each damage instance dealt, gains 1 stack of Winning Belief
Skill.Vertebrae 1: This skill will no longer increase CRIT DMG, but deals two instances of damage equivalent to 100% ATK. If the first damage instance CRITs, increases the CRIT rate and CRIT DMG of the second damage instance by 100% and 80% respectively
Skill.Fixed Key 2: Cold Precision Shot: If this skill kills the enemy, increase Contamination Gauge by 1 point

Skill2.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 9 tile radius and deals Physical damage equivalent to 130% ATK to it, increases Contamination Gauge by 4 points and gains 2 layers of Conventional Strategy
Skill2.Vertebrae 3: Gains 2 layers of Emergency Strategy instead
Skill2.Fixed Key 4: Professional Tactics: After skill activation, if there are no allies within a 3 tiles radius of self, gains 1 layer of Lone Wolf

Ultimate.SkillName:
Absolute Mental Defence

(Ultimate / Buff / Counter / Debuff)
Ultimate.Description: Gains Frost Barier and Overwatch for 2 turns. Frost Barrier can absorb damage equivalent to 65% ATK, but cannot exceed more than 60% max HP
Ultimate.Vertebrae 3: Frost Barrier can absorb damage equivalent to 65% → 80% ATK, but cannot exceed more than 60% → 80% max HP. Overwatch can be triggered 2 → 3 times per turn
Ultimate.Vertebrae 5:
After activating Absolute Mental Defence, at the end of each action, increases Contamination Gauge by 2 points. This effect can be activated twice

Overwatch can be triggered 3 → 4 times per turn. If Overwatch CRITs, gains Focused Attention for 1 turn

Passive.Description:
Increases CRIT by 40% and decresaes CRIT DMG by 10%

At the start of the turn, if HP is above 80%, gains Insight and Steady Movement until the start of the next round. When attacking enemies with Solidification, attacks ignore 4 Stability and increases damage dealt by 20%; when attacking enemies with Chill, attacks ignore 6 Stability and increases damage dealt by 30%; these two effects cannot be stacked
Passive.Vertebrae 4: When dealing Ice damage to enemies with Solidification, attacks ignore 4 → 6 Stability; when dealing Ice damage to enemies with Chill, attacks ignore 6 → 10 Stability
Passive.Vertebrae 6: When dealing Ice damage to enemies with Solidification or Chill, attacks ignore 10 Stability and increases damage dealt by 30%

1.Effect: This skill will no longer increase CRIT DMG, but deals two instances of damage equivalent to 100% ATK. If the first damage instance CRITs, increases the CRIT rate and CRIT DMG of the second damage instance by 100% and 80% respectively

2.Effect: Frost Barrier can absorb damage equivalent to 65% → 80% ATK, but cannot exceed more than 60% → 80% max HP. Overwatch can be triggered 2 → 3 times per turn

3.Effect: When dealing Ice damage to enemies with Solidification, attacks ignore 4 → 6 Stability; when dealing Ice damage to enemies with Chill, attacks ignore 6 → 10 Stability

5.Effect: When dealing Ice damage to enemies with Solidification or Chill, attacks ignore 10 Stability and increases damage dealt by 30%

6.Effect:
After activating Absolute Mental Defence, at the end of each action, increases Contamination Gauge by 2 points. This effect can be activated twice

Overwatch can be triggered 3 → 4 times per turn. If Overwatch CRITs, gains Focused Attention for 1 turn

7.Effect: Cold Precision Shot: If this skill kills the enemy, increases Contamination Gauge by 2 points

8.Effect: At the start of the battle, increases Contamination Gauge by 3 points

9.Effect: Professional Tactics: After skill activation, if there are no allies within a 3 tiles radius of self, gains 1 layer of Lone Wolf

10.Effect: If Lone Wolf Territory, Cold Precision Shot, or Professional Tactics is used while being on a Ice type tile, cleanses all Ice type debuffs for self and gains 3 tiles of Extra Movement

11.Effect: At the start of the battle, inflicts Cold Blooded Instinct on the enemy with the highest HP

12.Effect: At the start of the battle, increases ATK by 10%, lasts till HP drops below 100% for the first time

13.Effect: ATK +5.0% / At the start of the user's action, if the user's HP is above 80%, decreases Stability damage by 2 points when being attacked. This effect can be activated once per turn
